GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.10.90
GSD.description:
binder: fix async_free_space accounting for empty parcels

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.90 by commit 1cb8444f3114f0bb2f6e3bcadcf09aa4a28425d4, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit 74310e06be4d74dcf67cd108366710dee5c576d5. For more details please see the references link.
